abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio has blamed failures of communication and publicity for low approval ratings, and has pledged to better promote his administration's accomplishments; supporters, however, express dismay over what they view as his continued failure to do so.
lead_paragraph: Allies of Mr. de Blasio, who is uncomfortable with showmanship and admits to having communication problems, say he should promote his achievements more aggressively.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Still Trying, Fitfully, to Promote Himself
headline.print_headline: Mayor Trying, Fitfully, to Promote Himself

snippet: Allies of Mr. de Blasio, who is uncomfortable with showmanship and admits to having communication problems, say he should promote his achievements more aggressively.
